description: Returns a list of container recipes.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use the following filters to streamline results: containerType name parentImage platform (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a list operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: containerRecipeSummaryList
nested_items.description: The list of container recipes returned for the request.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: containerType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of container, such as 'Docker'.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The system platform for the container, such as Windows or Linux.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the container recipe.

nested_items.name: parentImage
nested_items.description: The base image for the container recipe.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when this container recipe was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
